sent.orig: Thus, the surround module can simply use or.
sent.trans: 因此surround模块可以简单的调用或者。

sent.orig: For example, the surround module might use the echo module.
sent.trans: 例如，surround模块可能会引用echo模块。

sent.orig: From the wicked who despoil me, My deadly enemies who surround me.
sent.trans: 诗17:9使我脱离那欺压我的恶人、就是围困我、要害我命的仇敌。

sent.orig: The action is played out on three screens in an almost surround-vision experience.
sent.trans: 动作场景以一种接近全景电影的视觉效果映现在三面银幕上。

sent.orig: The controversies, instead, surround efforts to improve the slums.
sent.trans: 取而代之的是，努力改善贫民窟的争论。
